query: select t.table_schema,t.table_name,c.column_name,c.column_type from tables t join columns c on c.table_schema = t.table_schema and c.table_name = t.table_name where t.table_schema = 'user' and c.table_schema = 'user' order by t.table_schema,t.table_name,c.column_name

v3-plan.Original: select t.table_schema,t.table_name,c.column_name,c.column_type from tables t join columns c on c.table_schema = t.table_schema and c.table_name = t.table_name where t.table_schema = 'user' and c.table_schema = 'user' order by t.table_schema,t.table_name,c.column_name

Instructions.FieldQuery: select t.table_schema, t.table_name, c.column_name, c.column_type from information_schema.`tables` as t join information_schema.`columns` as c on c.table_schema = t.table_schema and c.table_name = t.table_name where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select t.table_schema, t.table_name, c.column_name, c.column_type from information_schema.`tables` as t join information_schema.`columns` as c on c.table_schema = t.table_schema and c.table_name = t.table_name where t.table_schema = :__vtschemaname and c.table_schema = :__vtschemaname order by t.table_schema asc, t.table_name asc, c.column_name asc

gen4-plan.Original: select t.table_schema,t.table_name,c.column_name,c.column_type from tables t join columns c on c.table_schema = t.table_schema and c.table_name = t.table_name where t.table_schema = 'user' and c.table_schema = 'user' order by t.table_schema,t.table_name,c.column_name

Instructions.FieldQuery: select case t.table_schema when :__vtschemaname then :__vtkeyspacename else t.table_schema end as table_schema, t.table_name, c.column_name, c.column_type from information_schema.`tables` as t, information_schema.`columns` as c where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select case t.table_schema when :__vtschemaname then :__vtkeyspacename else t.table_schema end as table_schema, t.table_name, c.column_name, c.column_type from information_schema.`tables` as t, information_schema.`columns` as c where t.table_schema = :__vtschemaname and c.table_schema = :__vtschemaname and c.table_schema = t.table_schema and c.table_name = t.table_name order by t.table_schema asc, t.table_name asc, c.column_name asc

comment: system schema query as a subquery
query: SELECT (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name='MyDatabase' LIMIT 1);

v3-plan.Original: SELECT (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name='MyDatabase' LIMIT 1);

Instructions.FieldQuery: select (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where 1 != 1) from dual where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where schema_name = :__vtschemaname limit 1) from dual

gen4-plan.Original: SELECT (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name='MyDatabase' LIMIT 1);

Instructions.FieldQuery: select (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where 1 != 1) as `:__sq1` from dual where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where case schema_name when :__vtschemaname then :__vtkeyspacename else schema_name end = :__vtschemaname limit 1) as `:__sq1` from dual

comment: system schema query as a derived table
query: SELECT * from (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name='MyDatabase' LIMIT 1) x

v3-plan.Original: SELECT * from (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name='MyDatabase' LIMIT 1) x

Instructions.FieldQuery: select * from (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where 1 != 1) as x where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select * from (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where schema_name = :__vtschemaname limit 1) as x

gen4-plan.Original: SELECT * from (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name='MyDatabase' LIMIT 1) x

Instructions.FieldQuery: select x.`1` from (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where 1 != 1) as x where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select x.`1` from (select 1 from information_schema.schemata where schema_name = :__vtschemaname limit 1) as x
